reviews.text: I recently celebrated my birthday lunch here with my family and was thoroughly impressed. The food selection was quite extensive. The dessert offerings were delightful, with a pleasing variety to choose from. The service was excellent - attentive, friendly, and made the experience even more enjoyable. The restaurant offers exceptional value for money, and I look forward to returning. While the quality had declined somewhat following the pandemic, I am pleased to say it has fully returned to its former standard. I highly recommend this establishment.

We went to Kiseki this afternoon and truly enjoy the food.

The food varieties are ample. We took the senior citizens promotion but the normal weekday lunch price of $29.90++ is still worth it considering the diverse varieties of food.

The staff are very service oriented. We would like to thank Iwin and his team for rendering us a good dining experience at Kiseki.

Definitely we will patronise Kiseki again in the near future.

Recently visited this Japanese lunch buffet and was pleased with the affordable pricing and extensive spread of dishes. The service was attentive and timely, with no rush to finish our meal.

However, the food quality was inconsistent, with some dishes standing out while others fell short. Overall, it was a reasonably good dining experience, suitable for those looking for a variety of Japanese options without breaking the bank.

I‚Äôd like to express my sincere appreciation for JO, who provided excellent service throughout our experience. From the booking process to our dinner, JO was incredibly helpful and attentive. I‚Äôm truly grateful for the outstanding support and will definitely recommend the team to our family and friends. Big thanks again to JO for making everything smooth and memorable!‚Äù

Really crowded and some seats are narrow and near to the food. Otherwise, the services of the cleaning lady and the uncle helping with the shabu setup were excellent. A good variety of food, I liked the sashimi and shabu. The tempura and desserts were alright.
-
Visited again, the quality of the food is fresh and they replenish frequently. There is a good range of drinks such as winter melon and barley which mum liked, cakes are not as nice but cheese cake was better.
Family prefers this buffet to the hotel buffets. Lotsa elderly patrons due to their promotion for seniors.
‚Äî
No cheese cake today but they had matcha red bean cake and pudding, mango pudding was also nice, all not so sweet and suit my taste. I enjoy their steamed sweet potato, some of the sweet potato tempura too. My family enjoys eating here. Thumbs up for the service of the staff. üëçüëç
